name: 100ft Robot Golf
description: 100ft Robot Golf is a fast-paced arcade golf game where you get to control impossibly large robots on their quest for par. Just swing your golf club to smash even the tallest buildings out of the way - or into the way of your robot golfing buddies.
minimum_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: 64-bit version of Windows 7 with SP1 or later, Windows 8, or Windows 10 Processor: Intel Core i5 or faster Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: GTX 670 or faster DirectX: Version 11 Network: Broadband Internet connection
recommended_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
